title: 2015-10-06 - Targeted Attack Exposes OWA Weakness
plain_text:
# Targeted Attack Exposes OWA Weakness

**[threatpost.com/targeted-attack-exposes-owa-weakness/114925/](https://threatpost.com/targeted-attack-exposes-owa-weakness/114925/)**

Twitter

Microsoft Word also leveraged in the email campaign, which uses a 22-year-old Office RCE
bug. [https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx](https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx)
